text:
@realDonaldTrump 🙄You are such a complete moron. 

Fun fact: the R-0 worldwide of Ebola is roughly the same as Covid19, but the Case Fatality Rate is MUCH higher. Why didn’t Ebola decimate our people and economy the way C19 has?  I wonder... (Look at Trump’s twitter feed for the answer. ✌🏼)
